    • org.apache.archiva.admin.repository.AbstractRepositoryAdmin
      • org.apache.archiva.admin.repository.managed.DefaultManagedRepositoryAdmin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    @Service(value="managedRepositoryAdmin#default")
public class DefaultManagedRepositoryAdmin
extends AbstractRepositoryAdmin
implements ManagedRepositoryAdmin
